text: Somebody help I tried to use the key on *Test Call* <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/owners> and it response correctly but when I check the function location from my HubSpot as "<https://domainurl/_hcms/api/demo>" it says  `{"error":"The endpoint GET demo has not been configured for portal 7475627"}`   what should I do. is it on the settings of Apikey ? let me know :pray:
Delete your private app key, everyone can see it
You configure the method for the endpoint in the serverless.json file, here's an example
This endpoint will only allow for POST requests, no GET requests
Is the boilerplate the way to go now a days for adding in outside packages? <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-webpack-serverless-boilerplate>
Hello sir , when using method "POST" does if pull owners information ?
By the way sir.,  Is it need to install a nodejs on HubSpot inorder that code to work ? or is it automatic already. thanks
